metadata.title: CVE-2019-5816 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Process lifetime issue in Chrome in Google Chrome on Android prior to74.0.3729.108 allowed a remote attacker to potentially persist an exploitedprocess via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
